resources.string: You do not have permission for the operation.
The weight is not valid. It should be an integer between 1 and 100.
The field for %(var_name)s must be an integer.
The field for %(var_name)s must be a decimal.
The field %(field_name)s was provided with an invalid length. It expects a string that has a minimum length of %(min_len)s and a maximum length of %(max_len)s.
